attributes.background: Privatization must be limited to for-profit and fully taxed status

rejection.details:
We think that you are asking for the Government to only privatise national services if they will create a profit (which can then be taxed). 

If you would like to redraft and resubmit your petition it will be reconsidered. Please also note that you will need to include your full name for us to be able to accept your petition.
